column5: In 2016 my group took our second fly in fishing trip with White River Air to Shekak Lake Overall it was a great trip but unlike our first fly in trip we had to work super hard to find fish every day We had a lot of different weather blow in during the week which I am sure had an impact but man it was tough some days Pull into a spot - get into a fish or three right away and then they seemed to disappear Newest post is up https://www.northernjacks.com/post/looking-for-a-fish-to-happen Cheers Andrew
Thanks for sharing Andrew. So would you share where the Hump is located on the lake? ThanksðŸ˜€ Thanks
